Articles.Content: Have the game, on starting a new game, procedurally (generate/select from a list/both) outer planets and moons. It could pick outer planets (beyond the current stock) from a list of pre-made planets and moons both included with the game and mod packs and/or generate them. This would make each game slightly different.

I don't think even more planets and moons should be made. The game principles have to change first, and beyond that, instead of new celestial bodies, the current ones should be refined, as there isn't much you can do currently. Also, how would that work with contracts?

From the What Not To Suggest List: New stars, planets, moons and/or asteroids

For a variety of reasons the devs seem to be resistant to randomly generated planets, they want players to share an identical solar system.

Locking this one up.
